SEARCH
Module io.inverno.mod.http.base
Package io.inverno.mod.http.base.header

Interface Headers.Authorization

All Superinterfaces:
Header
Enclosing class:
Headers
public static interface Headers.Authorization extends Header

Authorization HTTP header as defined by RFC 7235 Section 4.2.

Since:
1.5
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    AUTH_SCHEME_BASIC
    Designates the basic authentication scheme as defined by RFC 7617 Section 2.
    static final String
    AUTH_SCHEME_BEARER
    Designates the bearer authentication scheme as defined by RFC 6750 Section 2.1
    static final String
    AUTH_SCHEME_DIGEST
    Designates the digest authentication scheme as defined by RFC 7616 Section 3.4.
    static final String
    AUTH_SCHEME_NEGOTIATE
    Desginates the negotiate authentication scheme as defined by RFC 4559 Section 4.
